org.odk.collect.android.preferences

Class CaptionedListPreference

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.preference.Preference
      • androidx.preference.DialogPreference
        • androidx.preference.ListPreference
          • org.odk.collect.android.preferences.CaptionedListPreference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<androidx.preference.Preference>

    public class CaptionedListPreference
extends androidx.preference.ListPreference
    A ListPreference where each item has a caption and the entire dialog also has a caption.
